alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 9:38PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CAMERON AND SOUTHEASTERN CALCASIEU PARISHES THROUGH 1030 PM CST... At 938 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hackberry, or near Sabine National Wildlife, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Grand Lake, Hackberry, Holly Beach, Hacketts Corner, Creole, Heberts Marina, Sweet Lake, Gibbstown, and Rutherford Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
